title: Hour 3 - Dale Earnhardt Jr. (06-17-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Dale Earnhardt Jr. (06-17-20)
description:
Dale Earnhardt Jr Tells dan that he is still officially retired; although he has been driving on the semi-pro circuit. Dale also tells Dan about a time when he almost threw out one of his fathers fire suits.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
